EmailTemplate.name: 201809_DSILicense_LG.201809_DSILicense_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Sourcing Update for Our Condition-Based Maintenance & Health Usage Monitoring Systems
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> SOURCING UPDATE FOR OUR CONDITION-BASED MAINTENANCE AND HEALTH USAGE MONITORING SYSTEMS Dear Customer: You have received this email because our records indicate that this information is relevant to you. If you no longer need this information, please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Distribution-Update.html]]> to update your information.
As part of our continuing efforts to improve service of our Condition-Based Maintenance Systems (CBMS) and Health Usage Monitoring Systems (HUMS) product lines, Honeywell Aerospace has entered into a licensing and a master distributorship agreement with Diagnostic Solutions International (DSI) LLC. DSI is an industry-leading company with a combined over 350 years experience in diagnosing and solving complex vibration issues. These changes will not affect OEM and United States military/Department of Defense customers using model RECON, 1134, 1209, 1239 or ZTE products. Distribution to China will be handled through BGA aftermarket partners. License Agreement - Effective January 1, 2019 DSI is now licensed to manufacture specific components of the CBMS/HUMS product line which are currently manufactured in Olathe (see item A in the table below).
- Development of all platform software applications, ground station software, and data acquisition unit firmware is licensed to DSI. - Service level agreements (SLA) for Olathe HUMS Data Analysis Services is being transitioned to DSI. - Honeywell will continue to produce all currently active data acquisition units, trackers, and select sensors. - All accessories currently manufactured in Olathe, (e.g. brackets, cables, application software, ground software, etc.) will transition to DSI. - This license agreement does not apply to models: 1239, 1134, 1209, or ZTE.
Master Distributor Agreement - Effective January 1, 2019 DSI is the master distributor for CBMS/HUMS as defined in the table below.
- Honeywell will no longer have a distribution agreement with the CBMS/HUMS distributors. - However, DSI has advised that they intend to maintain these existing companies as their CBMS/HUMS distributors. - Current distributors in China are not affected. - Current Japanese trading companies are not affected for models: 1239, 1134, 1209, or ZTE.
Order models and specific part numbers from:

See the impacted parts list here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/CombinedPartList_CBMS.xlsx]]>. What do you need to know about placing orders?
- Existing production orders - Existing orders placed before January 1, 2019 will be honored and shipped with the appropriate Honeywell 8130 or Certificate of Conformance. - New production orders - Effective January 1, 2019, order from the designated location identified on the chart above, except for U.S. military customers that will have until February 1, 2019. - Repair orders:
- Commercial: Direct orders to DSI or the DSI distributor network. - U.S. Military/OEM (item A products): Direct orders to DSI or the DSI distributor network. - U.S. Military/OEM (item B products): Direct orders to either Honeywell or DSI or the DSI distributor network.
- Exchanges
- DAU part numbers 1239-6050-FA, 901-15175, 901-17700 - Direct all orders to DSI or to the DSI distributor network.
- AOG (item A products): Effective January 1, 2019, all AOG shipments will be supported by DSI. - AOG (item B products): No change - contact Honeywell (except for 1239-6050-FA exchanges).
What information do I need to have to establish DSI as a new supplier? Update your authorized supplier list and internal systems to include the new supplier location as an approved supplier:
- Company Name: Diagnostic Solutions International LLC - Address: 2580 East Philadelphia Street, Unit C - City, State: Ontario, CA - Postal Code: 91761 - Country: United States - Phone: 1-877-374-5521 or International +1-909-930-3600 - CAGE CODE: 4Z9A3 - DUNS number: 804760929 - AS9120, AS9100: 194671-2016-AQ-USA-ANAB, 194672-2016-AQ-USA-ANAB - Contact email: chadwick@dsi-hums.com <mailto:chadwick@dsi-hums.com> - Web Address: www.dsi-hums.com <http://www.dsi-hums.com>
If you have any questions, please reach out to your Customer Support Program Manager (CSPM). Identify my CSPM. <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/contact-us#directory]]>
Honeywell Aerospace Visit MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/R00q00oI0G002000QQXh7Z0]]>
